sentences.english: When Bear got home, he dumped all the money out of his piggy bank.
sentences.chinese: 小熊回到家，把撲滿裏的錢都拿了出來。

sentences.english: The computer screen is covered with dust.
sentences.chinese: 電腦屏幕上撲滿了灰塵。

sentences.english: Put moneyinto a piggy bank that has to be smashed to get the money out.
sentences.chinese: 把錢放進一個撲滿，要打碎它才能取出錢。

sentences.english: He puts his savings in his earthenware money box every day.
sentences.chinese: 他將每天省下的零用錢放進撲滿裏。
